document.docAuthor: González, Christian R., Elgueta, Mario & Ramirez, Francisco
document.masterDocTitle: A catalog of Acroceridae (Diptera) from Chile

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A catalog of Acroceridae (Diptera) from Chile

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species:
Megalybus pictus Philippi, 1865
; by present designation.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
=
Megalybus
Westwood, 1876 : 511
(posterior homonym of
Megalybus Philippi, 1865
). Type species:
Megalybus pictus Westwood, 1876
(=
Megalybus pictus Philippi, 1865
); by present designation.

caption.paragraph: TABLE 1. List of the Acroceridae recorded from Chile.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Holotype: female, Corral (no type specimen deposited in MNNC, presumably lost). Dist.: Coquimbo (Elqui: La Serena); Metropolitana (Chacabuco: Caleu; Cordillera: El Canelo, El Peñón, La Obra, Reserva Nacional Río Clarillo; Santiago: Lo Aguirre—on flowers of
Trevoa trinervis Miers.
); Biobío (Arauco: Parque Nacional Nahuelbuta; Ñuble: Las Trancas, Los Lleuques, Puente Marchant, San Fabián de Alico—on flowers of
Castanea sativ
a); Los Ríos (Valdivia: Corral, San Juan); Los Lagos (Llanquihue: Casa Pangue—on flowers of Chrysantemun leucanthenum and various shrubs, Ensenada—on flowers of
Berberis
; Osorno: Antillanca). Argentina: Neuquén (Lago Queñi, Paso Puyehue (actually Paso Cardenal Samoré)), on flowers of
Lathyrus multiceps Clos
).

Syntypes: Santiago, female (no type specimens deposited in MNNC). Dist.: Valparaíso (Marga Marga: Marga Marga, Parque Nacional La Campana sector Granizo; Petorca: Putaendo; Valparaíso: El Salto, San Gerónimo); Metropolitana (Chacabuco: Caleu; Cordillera: El Canelo—on flowers of
Oxalis sp.
, El Manzano, La Obra—on
Haplopappus sp
., Quebrada El Purgatorio; Maipo: Rangue; Santiago: cerro La Provincia, cerro Manquehue—on flowers of
Stachys albicaulis Lindl.
, cerro San Cristóbal, Lo Aguirre—on flowers of
Trevoa trinervis Miers.
and
Podanthus mitiqui Lindl., Peñalolén
, Santiago; Talagante: Talagante—on flowers of
Azara dentata Ruiz et Pavon
); O’Higgins (Colchagua: Chomedahue); Maule (Talca: Cumpeo); Biobío (Concepción: Concepción; Ñuble: Puente Marchant, Termas de Chillán); Los Ríos (Valdivia: San Juan); Los Lagos (Llanquihue: Casa Pangue, Puerto Varas; Chiloé: Castro). Argentina: Neuquén (Confluencia Traful, Lago Queñi, Lago Tromen, Paso Puyehue (actually Paso Cardenal Samoré), Villa Traful. on flowers of
Budleja globosa Hope
,
Embothrium coccineum J. R. Forst. & G. Forst.
,
Senecio zosterifolius Hook. et Arn.
). Biology: reared from
Amaurobiidae ( Schlinger, 1987 )
.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
=
Megalybus pictu
s
Westwood, 1876 : 511
, pl. V fig. 4 (not Philippi, 1865 ). Syntypes: female, Chile (UMO).
Kertész, 1909 : 3
(as synonym of
M. pictus Philippi
).

=
Megalybus subcylindricus
Westwood, 1876 : 512
–513 (not Philippi, 1865 ). Syntypes: Valdivia (UMO);
Edwards, 1930 : 193
(as synonym of
M. pictus
).

=
Megalybus gracilis
Cole, 1919 : 59
(fig. 1), 61–62 (misidentification, not Philippi, 1865 ; not Westwood, 1876 );
Edwards, 1930 : 193
(as synonym of
M. pictus
).
